Headline: Northbound #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/Lake
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via near State/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Randolph, Dearborn, Wacker, Illinois, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near State/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
